title: Bevelations with Bevy Smith
description:
Most people know Bevy Smith as co-host of the Bravo show Fashion Queens and host of the daily podcast Bevelations. But what they may not know is the path this self described ‘curvy woman from Harlem’ took to get there. Nikki gets the scoop on Bevy’s late career fame on TV, surviving COVID-19, her long-running SiriusXM podcast, and forthcoming memoir “Bevelations; Lessons from a Mutha, Auntie, Bestie.”

Follow Bevy online at Bevy Smith

For more on her forthcoming memoir have a sneak peek here Bevelations | Bevy Smith | Macmillan
